plot: Thomas suffers from strange weightlessness crises. Distressed, his mother takes every means to to bring him down to earth.
title: Le poids du vide
plot_es: Thomas suffers from strange weightlessness crises. Distressed, his mother takes every means to to bring him down to earth.
plot_en: Thomas suffers from strange weightlessness crises. Distressed, his mother takes every means to to bring him down to earth.
